comment: On the left is year old Dennis. The Swedish authorities decided to DEPORT him back to Ukraine after his mother died and put him in foster care. To the left are three Somalian men who were convicted of GANGRAPING a year old girl. They got months "youth detention"
amr:
# ::snt On the left is year old Dennis. The Swedish authorities decided to DEPORT him back to Ukraine after his mother died and put him in foster care. To the left are three Somalian men who were convicted of GANGRAPING a year old girl. They got months "youth detention"
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Dennis")
            :age (t / temporal-quantity
                  :quant 1
                  :unit (y / year))
            :location (l / left-19))
      :snt2 (d / decide-01
            :ARG0 (a / authority
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Sweden")))
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (d2 / deport-01
                        :ARG0 a
                        :ARG1 p
                        :direction (b / back)
                        :time (a3 / after
                              :op1 (d3 / die-01
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                          :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                                                :ARG1 p
                                                :ARG2 (m2 / mother))))))
                  :op2 (p3 / put-01
                        :ARG0 a
                        :ARG1 p
                        :ARG2 (c2 / care-03
                              :ARG1 p
                              :mod (f / foster)))))
      :snt3 (ii / include-91
            :ARG1 (m3 / man
                  :quant 3
                  :mod (c3 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Somalia"))
                  :ARG1-of (c4 / convict-01
                        :ARG2 (g / gag-01
                              :ARG0 m3
                              :ARG1 (g2 / girl
                                    :age (t2 / temporal-quantity
                                          :quant 1
                                          :unit (y2 / year)))))
                  :ARG2 (l2 / left-19))
            :snt4 (g3 / get-01
                  :ARG0 (t3 / they)
                  :ARG1 (d4 / detain-01
                        :ARG1 t3
                        :mod (y3 / youth)
                        :duration (m4 / multiple
                              :op1 (t4 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (m5 / month)))))))
